name: stewie
body:
![stewie](http://www.flavioribeiro.com/stewie.png)

### stewie 
This project is result of [FedexDay](http://
www.atlassian.com/fedex-day) at [Globo.com](http://www.globo.com). 

The main idea of the project is help you on the detection of anomaly in a generic mass of data. It receives and stores generic parameters and learns how they are correlated. If some event occurs and these parameters exhibit a strange behavior, it alerts.

Since we have a timebox to finish this project, more documentation about how the things work will be posted here in the next days. Basically, we used some theory from [here](http://s3.amazonaws.com/mlclass-resources/docs/slides/Lecture15.pdf). 

### Authors and Contributors
Juarez Bochi (@jbochi)

Fl√°vio Ribeiro (@flavioribeiro)

Igor Sobreira (@igorsobreira)

Luiz Lemos (@luizlemos)

### Sponsor (pizza, hosting and stuff in general :-)

![Globo.com](http://www.flavioribeiro.com/globo.com.png)
tagline: system for anomaly detection in mass generic data
